awards.title: 23rd NTvN award, second prize
awards.description: I received the second prize for the NTvN award (https://www.ntvn.nl/prijsvraag/). This was for my article "Molecuulbotsingen ontrafeld", written for Dutch physicists.

awards.title: Selected to participate in the 66th Lindau Nobel Laureate Meeting on physics
Frye stipendium 2015
awards.description:
Since 1990, the Radboud University awards every year 10 Frye stipends for promising research to female researchers. The aim of the scholarship is to encourage doctoral students to pursue their academic careers after completing their dissertation. The fellowships, amounting to € 3,500 each, are intended to be used for conducting research abroad.

The fellowships are named after Dr I.B.M. Frye, who became one of the first female members of Radboud University's academic staff in 1953.

http://www.ru.nl/nieuws-agenda/nieuws/vm/algemeen/2015/frye-stipendia-tien-vrouwelijke-onderzoekers-2015/
